html.p: Ismater's taverns are much like those anywhere else: rough, none too clean, with a clientele somewhere between disreputable and repulsive. You sip your ale slowly and eat some good home-made pie, meanwhile listening for any interesting bits of gossip. You don't overhear anything of note, but a grey-robed man sitting in the corner of the tavern seems to be keeping a watchful eye on you. Looking out of the corner of your eye, you see that he is lean and dark-haired and has a scar on his face and a tattoo on one of his forearms. Will you:

ul.li: Go over and challenge the robed man?
Go over and talk to the robed man?
